item.title: Schein
item.description: Use the magic of light to explore hidden worlds in the trickiest puzzle platformer you’ll play all year.

item.title: Coral Reef
item.description: Take a virtual deep dive into the stunning underwater world of corals

item.title: Rebuilders
item.description: Design your own vehicle and restore balance to the world.

item.title: Luther
item.description: Outlaws! Help reformer Martin Luther and his fellows to survive their escape.

item.title: Press: Schein
item.description: December, 2013: Der Standard – Wer kauft heute noch Spiele um 50 Euro? * DVD-Forum – Interview mit Zeppelin Studio * WEAVE 06.13 – Casual Games PLAY AS YOU ARE * [print ed.] in-ga.me – “Schein” und “The Balloon Quest” räumen ab * GamingXP – Der Deutsche Entwicklerpreis 2013 * 4 Players – Deutscher Entwicklerpreis 2013: Wer gewann was? * Newsslash – Deutscher Entwicklerpreis 2013 * Deutscher Entwicklerpreis – Alle Gewinner 2013 * heise – Deutscher Entwicklerpreis * October, 2013: nerdLICH – Schein: Indie Jump and Run aus Österreich * Spielend programmieren – Gamecity Review * September, 2013: telekom-presse – Game City 2013: Xbox One, PS4 und zahlreiche neue Spiele * Tiroler Tageszeitung – Österreicher schicken Spieler in den Sumpf* Coop Doods – Game City 2013: Schein Entwicklerinterview* FM4 – Schlange stehen, prunkvoll spielen* Zock Around The Clock – Schein* nerdLICH – Auf der Game City 2013 inklusive Fotos * Consol.

item.title: Anti Entropy Privacy Policy
item.description: Hi, If you would like to know why we collect your private data, how we use it and who else may access it, you’ve come to the right place. Generally speaking: We value your privacy. We don’t care where you are, who you are, or what you do when you are not playing Rebuilders. We make games. We’re not a dystopian authoritarian government. We just need to save some information on servers, so you can save your progress online, and for us to evaluate the usage of our games and features.

item.title: Milkshake Privacy Policy

We just need to save some information on servers, so you can save your progress online, and for us to evaluate the usage of our games and features.
